mapper.select: SELECT * FROM p10_task_node WHERE casee_id=#{caseeId} AND del_flag=0 AND node_type=0 ORDER BY sort asc

SELECT p10_task_node.*, p10_casee.company_code as companyCode, p10_casee.casee_type as caseeType, p10_target.target_name as targetName, p10_target.target_type as targetType, p10_target.status_confirm as targetStatusConfirm, p10_target.status as targetStatus, p10_target.target_type as targetType, p10_target.business_type as businessType, sys_user.nick_name as entrustedNickName, p10_outles.outles_name as entrustedOutlesName, p10_institution.ins_name as entrustedInsName FROM p10_task_node left join p10_casee on p10_casee.casee_id=p10_task_node.casee_id and p10_casee.del_flag=0 left join p10_target on p10_target.target_id=p10_task_node.target_id and p10_target.del_flag=0 left join sys_user on sys_user.user_id=p10_task_node.update_by and sys_user.del_flag=0 left join p10_outles on p10_outles.outles_id=p10_task_node.outles_id and p10_outles.del_flag=0 left join p10_institution on p10_institution.ins_id=p10_task_node.ins_id and p10_institution.del_flag=0 WHERE p10_task_node.del_flag=0 AND node_id =#{nodeId}
